name: Adrian Cochrane
text:
@roytang I'm really not keeping up with movies (though I might cynically say most of it now is nostalgia for 1980's-early 20,00's), so maybe I'm not the best to ask.

But I have just greatly enjoyed Don't Look Up, so let's go with that?
